newsitem.title: USA: TVA Sequoyah 1 power unit holds at 55 pct.
newsitem.headline: TVA Sequoyah 1 power unit holds at 55 pct.

text.p: TVA Nuclear's 1,148 megawatt (MW) Sequoyah 1 nuclear unit in Soddy-Daisy, Tenn., is holding at 55 percent power Tuesday morning following an outage over the weekend, the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) said.
The NRC daily status report said the unit was holding the current production level to place in service a second main feedwater pump.
No further details were available. The TVA declines as a matter of policy to comment on the status of its plants' operations.
TVA Nuclear is a unit of the Tennessee Valley Authority, a federal agency that produces and markets electricity.
